//   samplerCUBE PixelTextureCube_0;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float4 UniformPixelScalars_3;
//   float4 UniformPixelScalars_4;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;

// Registers:

//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1

//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1         c8       1
//   UniformPixelVector_2         c9       1
//   UniformPixelVector_3         c10      1
//   UniformPixelVector_4         c11      1
//   UniformPixelScalars_3        c12      1
//   UniformPixelScalars_4        c13      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c14      1
//   SceneColorTexture            s0       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1             s2       1
//   PixelTextureCube_0           s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c3, 0.899999976, 1.5, 2, -1
    def c6, 2.5, 3.5, -9.99999997e-007, 1.20000005
    def c7, 0, 15, 0, 0
    dcl_color v0.xyz
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5_pp v4
    dcl_texcoord6 v5.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v6.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_cube s3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

// Unreal Engine SceneColorTexture halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-halo-sct --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 CRC32_E24A55AD_1142.txt
mov r30, r30
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    dp3 r0.x, v4, v4
    add r0.y, -r0.x, -c3.w
    mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, -c3.w
    pow r1.x, r0.x, c14.w
    mul r0, r0.y, v4.w
    mov r2, r0
    texkill r2
    mov r2.xyw, c3
    mad r0.xy, v2, r2, c9
    texld r3, r0, s1
    mad r0.xyz, r3, c3.z, c3.w
    mul r1.yzw, r0.xxyz, c12.y
    mov r2.xy, c6
    mad r2.xy, v2, r2, c10
    texld r3, r2, s2
    mad r2.xyz, r3, c3.z, c3.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2, c12.y
    mul r0.xyz, r0, r3
    mad r1.yzw, r2.xxyz, r1, -r0.xxyz
    dp3 r2.x, v5, v5
    rsq r2.x, r2.x
    mad r2.y, v5.z, -r2.x, -c3.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2.x, v5
    cmp r2.x, r3.z, r2_abs.y, -c3.w
    add r2.y, r2.x, c6.z
    pow r3.w, r2.x, c6.w
    cmp r2.x, r2.y, r3.w, c7.x
    add r2.y, r2.x, c6.z
    pow r3.w, r2.x, c12.z
    cmp r2.x, r2.y, r3.w, c7.x
    mad r0.xyz, r2.x, r1.yzww, r0
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, c8
    nrm_pp r4.xyz, r0
    dp3 r0.x, r4, r3
    mul r0.xyz, r0.x, r4
    mad r0.xyz, r0, c3.z, -r3
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, v1
    nrm_pp r5.xyz, v0
    mul_pp r1.yzw, r3.xzxy, r5.xyzx
    mad_pp r1.yzw, r3.xyzx, r5.xzxy, -r1
    dp3 r3.z, r3, r0
    dp3 r3.x, r5, r0
    mul r1.yzw, r1, v1.w
    dp3 r3.y, r1.yzww, r0
    texld r3, r3, s3
    mul r1.yzw, r2.x, r3.xxyz
    add_sat r2.x, r2.x, c13.x
    mov r3.w, c12.w
    mad r1.yzw, r3.w, r1, c11.xxyz
    add r3.xyz, -r2.w, -c0
    mul_pp r1.yzw, r1, r3.xxyz
    mad_pp r1.yzw, r1, c4.w, c4.xxyz
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, v3
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r0, r3
    dp3_sat_pp r0.y, r4, r3
    pow_pp r2.y, r0.x, c7.y
    add r0.x, r0.x, c6.z
    mul_pp r3.xyz, r2.y, c5
    cmp_pp r3.xyz, r0.x, r3, c7.x
    add r0.x, r0.y, c6.z
    cmp_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, c7.x
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r1.yzww, r0.x, r3
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, v4.w
    mul r0.xyz, r1.x, r0
    mul r1.xyz, r0, c14
    rcp r0.x, r30.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r30
    mad r3.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r3.zw, c7.x
    texldl r3, r3, s0
    add r0.x, -r2.w, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r3.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, -c2.x, r0.x, -r30.w
    rcp r0.y, c13.y
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    mul r1.w, r0.x, r2.x
    cmp oC0, -r0.w, c7.x, r1

// approximately 96 instruction slots used (5 texture, 91 arithmetic)
